meaningMnemonic: Something that's <kanji>certain</kanji>ly <kanji>necessary</kanji> is something you can't live without. It's <vocabulary>indispensable</vocabulary>. And it's <vocabulary>required</vocabulary> by you to keep on living.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
